title: How many views did the 2017 oce finals between Direwolves and Legacy get
body: looked around cant find it need for a school project thanks

replies.body: i think it was about 1kish on youtube usually 10x on twitch(though 10k viewers doesn't sound right for the opl)  getting in touch with riot oce would be the way to go
Not enough to make a fuss about if it's not published anywhere.
